name: Dr. Kureha
text: On Play: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, choose a (Tony Tony Chopper) or a card with the (Drum Kingdom) type except for Dr. Kureha and reveal it then add it to your hand. Then, put the remaining to the bottom of the deck in any order.
